
=head1 NAME

figure

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 uuid (character varying(36)) - 
 chapter_id (integer) - 
 title (character varying(256)) - 
 caption (character varying(2048)) - 
 attributes (character varying(512)) - 
 time_start (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 time_end (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 lat_max (character varying(45)) - 
 lat_min (character varying(45)) - 
 lon_max (character varying(45)) - 
 lon_min (character varying(45)) - 
 keywords (character varying(512)) - 
 usage_limits (character varying(512)) - 
 submission_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 create_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 source_citation (character varying(256)) - 
 ordinal (integer) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                           Table "gcis_metadata.figure"
      Column      |              Type              |                      Modifiers                      | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 -----------------+--------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-------------
  id              | integer                        | not null default nextval('figure_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
  uuid            | character varying(36)          |                                                     | extended |              | 
  chapter_id      | integer                        |                                                     | plain    |              | 
  title           | character varying(256)         |                                                     | extended |              | 
  caption         | character varying(2048)        |                                                     | extended |              | 
  attributes      | character varying(512)         |                                                     | extended |              | 
  time_start      | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                     | plain    |              | 
  time_end        | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                     | plain    |              | 
  lat_max         | character varying(45)          |                                                     | extended |              | 
  lat_min         | character varying(45)          |                                                     | extended |              | 
  lon_max         | character varying(45)          |                                                     | extended |              | 
  lon_min         | character varying(45)          |                                                     | extended |              | 
  keywords        | character varying(512)         |                                                     | extended |              | 
  usage_limits    | character varying(512)         |                                                     | extended |              | 
  submission_dt   | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                     | plain    |              | 
  create_dt       | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                     | plain    |              | 
  source_citation | character varying(256)         |                                                     | extended |              | 
  ordinal         | integer                        |                                                     | plain    |              | 
 Indexes:
     "figure_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "figure_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (chapter_id) REFERENCES chapter(id) MATCH FULL
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "image" CONSTRAINT "image_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (figure_id) REFERENCES figure(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
